summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4761 for the improvement of 19th avenue North (east side) from Calhoun Street to West Montlake Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55061, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
